item.agricraft.agri_seed_bag: 可疑而智能的种子分拣袋
agricraft.tooltip.magnifying_glass: 可以用来检查作物和其他物品基因组
agricraft.tooltip.clipper: 可以用来修剪作物花朵或叶子
agricraft.tooltip.journal_use_1: 潜行+右键，就能放置在种子分析仪上
agricraft.tooltip.journal_use_2: 右键来阅读，滚动滚轮来翻页
agricraft.tooltip.seed_bag_active: 它似乎总是能选出你要的种子
agricraft.tooltip.seed_bag_main_hand: 放在主手时，可以直接播种
agricraft.tooltip.seed_bag_off_hand: 放在副手时，可以从主手获取种子，或将种子提取到主手
agricraft.tooltip.seed_bag_scrolling: 潜行+滚动滚轮，可以改变筛选标准
agricraft.tooltip.seed_bag_inactive_1: 我最好先别使用它，会搞混种子的
agricraft.tooltip.seed_bag_inactive_2: 或许我应该先给它附魔
agricraft.tooltip.analyzer.l1: 可用于检查作物基因组
agricraft.tooltip.analyzer.l2: 右键来观察，潜行+右键来放入或取出种子
agricraft.tooltip.analyzer.l3: 在观察状态下，滚动滚轮来检查基因
agricraft.tooltip.tank.l1: 尽量不要掉进去了……至少在有梯子能救你出来之前
agricraft.tooltip.valve.l1: 放在水道上以控制流体
agricraft.tooltip.valve.l2: 放在普通水道上时，你可以手动控制阀门
agricraft.tooltip.valve.l3: 放在方块水道内时，请使用红石控制阀门
agricraft.tooltip.grate.l1: 一种可以攀爬的装饰方块
agricraft.tooltip.grate.l2: 使用剪刀，可以将葡萄藤固定或移除
agricraft.tooltip.greenhouse_monitor.l1: 展示温室的状态，也可以放置在温室外
agricraft.tooltip.greenhouse_monitor.l3: 但是必须满足以下条件：
agricraft.tooltip.greenhouse_monitor.l5: 而且天花板上要有足够的玻璃方块。
agricraft.tooltip.greenhouse_monitor.l6: 如果没有成功检测到温室，请尝试潜行+右键来刷新
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.soil: 这种作物需要在特定的土壤上生长
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.soil.humidi: 这种作物需要特定的土壤湿度来生长
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.soil.acidit: 这种作物需要特定的土壤酸度来生长
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.soil.nutrie: 这种作物需要特定的土壤肥力来生长
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.light: 这种作物只能在特定的光照水平下生长
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.redstone: 这种作物只能在根部具有特定的红石强度生长
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.fluid: 这种作物只能在特定的液体中生长
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.biome: 这种作物需要在特定的生物群落中生长
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.biome_categ: 这种作物只能在特定的生物群落中生长
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.dimension: 这种作物只能在特定的维度中生长
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.with_weed: 这种作物只能伴随杂草生长
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.without_wee: 这种作物只能在没有杂草时生长
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.day: 这种作物只能在白天生长
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.dusk: 这种作物只能在黄昏生长
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.night: 这种作物只能在夜晚生长
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.dawn: 这种作物只能在黎明生长
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.block_below: 这种作物只能在耕地下有一个特定的方块的情况下生长
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.block_nearb: 这种作物只能在附近有一定数量的特定方块的情况下生长
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.entity_near: 这种作物只能在附近有一定数量的特定实体的情况下生长
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.season: 这种作物只能在特定季节生长
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.structure_i: 这种作物只能生长在特定的结构附近
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.structure_o: 这种作物不能生长在某个结构附近
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.mana: 这种作物没有足够的法力来生长
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.soil.humidi: 这种作物不能在这种湿度的土壤上生长
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.soil.acidit: 这种作物不能在这种酸性的土壤上生长
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.soil.nutrie: 这种作物不能在这种肥力的土壤上生长
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.light.gener: 这种作物在目前的光照水平下无法生长
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.biome.gener: 这种作物不能在这个生物群落中生长
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.dimension.g: 这种作物不能在这个维度上生长
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.fluid.gener: 这种作物不能在这种流体中生长
agricraft.tooltip.growth_req.season.gene: 这种作物在当前季节无法生长
agricraft.tooltip.gene.animal_attractant: 这种作物可能会引起牛的注意
这种作物可能会引起鸡的注意
这种作物可能会引起熊猫的注意
这种作物可能会引起猪的注意
这种作物可能会引起兔子的注意
这种作物可能会引起羊的注意
这种作物可能会引起海龟的注意
agricraft.message.analyzer_view_blocked: 我不能这样观察种子，视线被挡住了。
agricraft.message.clipping_impossible: 这里没有什么值得修剪的。
agricraft.message.seed_bag_shake: 你使劲摇晃袋子，把种子打乱。
agricraft.message.seed_bag_sorter.defaul: 希望得到拥有整体优质基因的种子
agricraft.message.seed_bag_sorter.gain: 希望得到产量丰富的种子
agricraft.message.seed_bag_sorter.growth: 希望得到生长快速的种子
agricraft.message.seed_bag_sorter.streng: 希望得到适应性好的种子
agricraft.message.seed_bag_sorter.resist: 希望得到抵抗力强的种子
agricraft.message.seed_bag_sorter.fertil: 希望得到繁殖力强的种子
agricraft.message.seed_bag_sorter.mutati: 希望得到突变性高的种子
agricraft.message.trowel_weed: 我没法够到它，我应该先清理杂草。
agricraft.message.trowel_plant: 这儿已经有一株作物了。
agricraft.message.trowel_no_plant: 这里没有什么可拿走的。
agricraft.message.greenhouse_complete: 温度和湿度稳定，温室可运行
agricraft.message.greenhouse_insufficien: 温度过低，温室玻璃不足
agricraft.message.greenhouse_gaps: 温度和湿度稍不稳定，空间未密闭
agricraft.message.greenhouse_removed: 温度和湿度极不稳定，这里没有温室
agricraft.journal.introduction.paragraph: This is your very own Agricultural Journal, in here you can keep track of all the seeds you have discovered. To get started, simply place the journal on a seed analyzer and start analyzing seeds!

When analyzing the genome of a seed, you learn one or two things about it, such as what kind of environments it likes, how it will grow, what fruits it might bear, and to and from which other species it might mutate.
Can you discover all plant species?
agricraft.journal.crop_breeding.paragrap: To cross-breed two plants, they must be planted on crop sticks, with one block space in between. Place double crop sticks on this spot in the middle.
When both plants are mature, they have a probability of producing offspring, each passing on half of their DNA to their progeny.

The plant DNA, its genome, defines the species and stats of a plant. A genome consists of a set of gene pairs, which give rise to the traits of the plants. It is one gene of each of these pairs that is passed on to offspring, resulting in a new gene pair. Be wary however, every time this happens, there is a chance for a mutation to occur, as is illustrated above.
agricraft.journal.stats.paragraph_1: Plants have a set of different stats which will define their behaviour:
agricraft.journal.stats.growth: Governs the speed at which plants grow, a higher growth stats results in plants reaching maturity faster.
agricraft.journal.stats.gain: Governs the amount of fruits which plants will yield when harvested, a higher gain stat results in more and/or better fruits.
agricraft.journal.stats.strength: Stronger plants will be more resilient with regards to environmental conditions and will be able to grow in more hostile environments.
agricraft.journal.stats.resistance: This is the plant's resistance against weeds, a higher resistance stat will result in lower chances of weeds sprouting and killing the host plant.
agricraft.journal.stats.fertility: Governs the fertility of the plant, a higher fertility will increase the plant's probability to cross-breed with other plants and create progeny.
agricraft.journal.stats.mutativity: Governs the mutativity of the plants genes, a higher mutativity results in higher chances of positive mutations while lowering the probability of negative mutations.
agricraft.journal.growth_reqs.paragraph_: Each plant has a different set of growth requirements which define where it is fertile and can grow, this includes brightness, soil properties, and more. The plant pages in this journal have for each plant a dedicated section on the plant's growth requirements. This page serves as a brief glossary for these requirements.
agricraft.journal.growth_reqs.brightness: The bar above indicates the light level a plant needs to be able to grow.
agricraft.journal.growth_reqs.humidity.d: The humidity of a soil describes the quantity of water that is held within.
agricraft.journal.growth_reqs.acidity.de: Acidity ranges from acidic, over neutral, to alkaline, each plant having their preference.
Some soils hold more nutrients than others.
agricraft.journal.growth_reqs.seasons.de: Some plants choose to only grow during certain seasons, nobody really knows why.
agricraft.plant.allium.name: Allium
agricraft.plant.allium.desc: From the family of plants including the garlic, onion, and chive this plant produces a beautiful umbel consisting of many small purple blooms.
agricraft.plant.bamboo.name: Bamboo
agricraft.plant.beet_root.name: Beet Root
agricraft.plant.bluet.name: Azure Bluet
agricraft.plant.brown_mushroom.name: Brown Mushroom
agricraft.plant.cactus.name: Cactus
agricraft.plant.carrot.name: Carrot
agricraft.plant.cornflower.name: Cornflower
agricraft.plant.cornflower.desc: Also known as the bachelor's button.
agricraft.plant.crimson_fungus.name: Crimson Fungus
agricraft.plant.crimson_fungus.desc: It secretes a peculiar red ooze.
agricraft.plant.daisy.name: Oxeye Daisy
agricraft.plant.dandelion.name: Dandelion
agricraft.plant.dandelion.desc: While colloquially considered a weed, this yellow-flowering plant is one of unspoken value. Having a deep-rooting taproot, the plant brings up nutrients from lower levels of soil, making it a good companion plant for shallow rooting plants.
agricraft.plant.kelp.name: Kelp
agricraft.plant.kelp.desc: The vegan mermaid's snack of preference.
agricraft.plant.lily.name: Lily of the Valley
agricraft.plant.melon.name: Melon
agricraft.plant.nether_wart.name: Nether Wart
agricraft.plant.nether_wart.desc: An oddity from the nether, said to have somewhat mystical properties. The fungus appears to have a strong aptitude for heat, yet oddly cannot withstand the burning of the sun. Its fruit makes a covetable prize for the aspiring young brewer.
agricraft.plant.orange_tulip.name: Orange Tulip
agricraft.plant.orchid.name: Blue Orchid
agricraft.plant.pink_tulip.name: Pink Tulip
agricraft.plant.pink_tulip.desc: A pink varient of the perennial tulip plant. The plant is valued mostly for its distinctive blooms.
agricraft.plant.poppy.name: Poppy
agricraft.plant.poppy.desc: Producing colorful blooms, this plant has gained a reputation for certain medicinal uses. A better use, perhaps, this plant produces seeds that go well with baked goods, particularly for lemon-flavored ones.
agricraft.plant.potato.name: Potato
agricraft.plant.potato.desc: Po-ta-toes! Boil them, mash them, stick them in a stew.
agricraft.plant.pumpkin.name: Pumpkin
agricraft.plant.pumpkin.desc: If I eat enough of these will I turn orange?
agricraft.plant.red_mushroom.name: Red Mushroom
agricraft.plant.red_tulip.name: Red Tulip
agricraft.plant.red_tulip.desc: A vibrant red varient of the perennial tulip plant. The plant is valued mostly for its distinctive blooms.
agricraft.plant.sea_grass.name: Sea Grass
agricraft.plant.sea_pickle.name: Sea Pickle
agricraft.plant.sea_pickle.desc: Not as tasty as one might expect.
agricraft.plant.sweet_berry.name: Sweet Berry
agricraft.plant.sweet_berry.desc: You should make a cake out of it.
agricraft.plant.sugarcane.name: Sugarcane
agricraft.plant.sugarcane.desc: High in fructose, a healthy part of your daily breakfast.
agricraft.plant.warped_fungus.name: Warped Fungus
agricraft.plant.wheat.name: Wheat
agricraft.plant.wheat.desc: The cornerstone of the Agricultural Revolution.
agricraft.plant.white_tulip.name: White Tulip
agricraft.plant.white_tulip.desc: A snow-white varient of the perennial tulip plant. The plant is valued mostly for its distinctive blooms.
agricraft.plant.wither_rose.name: Wither Rose
agricraft.plant.wither_rose.desc: Nobody likes their roses withering, but this is on another level.
agricraft.plant.amathyllis.name: Amathyllis
agricraft.plant.aurigold.name: Aurigold
agricraft.plant.carbonation.name: Carbonation
agricraft.plant.carbonation.desc: A rare flower which has driven itself to the edge of extinction due its high flammability.
agricraft.plant.cuprosia.name: Cuprosia
agricraft.plant.cuprosia.desc: Known as the engineer's delight, this plant produces a substance of incredible utility.
agricraft.plant.diamahlia.name: Diamahlia
agricraft.plant.emeryllis.name: Emeryllis
agricraft.plant.ferranium.name: Ferranium
agricraft.plant.jaslumine.name: Jaslumine
agricraft.plant.jaslumine.desc: Jaslumine to some, Jaluminium to me. Shines like silver, but not all that valuable of a plant.
agricraft.plant.lapender.name: Lapender
agricraft.plant.nethereed.name: Nethereed
agricraft.plant.nethereed.desc: Regular reed's tougher cousin from the nether.
agricraft.plant.niccissus.name: Niccissus
agricraft.plant.niccissus.desc: While there is much debate over which is the best plant, we can all agree that the Niccissus plant is by far the most self-absorbed.
agricraft.plant.nitorwart.name: Nitor Wart
agricraft.plant.nitorwart.desc: It sure seems to like to glow.
agricraft.plant.osmonium.name: Osmonium
agricraft.plant.osmonium.desc: An unusually rare plant, thought to originate from outer space.
agricraft.plant.petinia.name: Petinia
agricraft.plant.petinia.desc: A distant cousin of the familiar petunia flower, this plant produces a substance frequently used to plate metal cans.
agricraft.plant.platiolus.name: Platiolus
agricraft.plant.platiolus.desc: The unquestioned king among the metal-bearing plants, this plant has a gleam to it that puts even the aurigold flower to shame.
agricraft.plant.plombean.name: Plombean
agricraft.plant.plombean.desc: In ancient times this plant was thought to bear a lifegiving fruit. Nowadays we know better.
agricraft.plant.quartzanthemum.name: Quartzanthemum
agricraft.plant.redstodendron.name: Redstodendron
agricraft.plant.redstodendron.desc: Much more complex than the average red algae.
agricraft.weed.weed.name: Weeds
agricraft.soil.clay.name: Clay Soil
agricraft.soil.crimson_nylium.name: Crimson Nylium Soil
agricraft.soil.farmland.name: Farmland Soil
agricraft.soil.mycelium.name: Mycelium Soil
agricraft.soil.podzol.name: Podzol Soil
agricraft.soil.sand.name: Sand Soil
agricraft.soil.soul_sand.name: Soul Sand Soil
agricraft.soil.soul_soil.name: Soul Soil Soil
agricraft.soil.gravel.name: Gravel Soil
agricraft.soil.warped_nylium.name: Warped Nylium Soil
agricraft.plant.abundance_amaranthus.des: Catkin-like cymes of densely packed flowers.
agricraft.plant.abundance_lavender.desc: A stem filled with fragrant, honey-scented purple buds.
agricraft.plant.abundance_purple_african: Like a Daisy, but from Africa.
agricraft.plant.abundance_yellow_african: Brings a cheerful splash of color.
agricraft.plant.aum.desc: A strange flower that grows in temperate regions. Wizards prize them for their healing properties.
agricraft.plant.cerublossom.desc: A curious flower that grows in temperate regions. They seem to radiate mana weakly.
agricraft.plant.desert_nova.desc: A blazing flower found in deserts. Vital for any mages looking to delve into fire magic.
agricraft.plant.tarma_root.desc: An odd root that grows in swampy areas. They have a natural affinity to earth magic.
agricraft.plant.wakebloom.desc: A strange flower that blooms on the surface of rivers. It is said to have a connection to dreams.
agricraft.plant.atmospheric_scalding_mon: Probably not good for your hair.
agricraft.plant.atmospheric_water_hyacin: It's too invasive to be left alive.
agricraft.plant.atmospheric_yucca_flower: You can use the leaves as a sword.
agricraft.plant.biomesoplenty_glowflower: A flower glowing in the dark.
agricraft.plant.biomesoplenty_glowshroom: A mushroom glowing in the dark.
agricraft.plant.biomesoplenty_lavender.d: A flower with multiple purple blossoms and a refreshing scent.
agricraft.plant.biomesoplenty_orange_cos: Doesn't it look like the sun?
agricraft.plant.biomesoplenty_pink_daffo: This flower is generally found near ponds or lakes.
agricraft.plant.biomesoplenty_pink_hibis: Its gigantic blooms are loved by bees, butterflies and hummingbirds.
agricraft.plant.biomesoplenty_rose.desc: One of the most popular and widely cultivated groups of flowering plants.
A type of edible mushroom found in the forest.
agricraft.plant.biomesoplenty_violet.des: A delicate flower growing in meadows.
agricraft.plant.biomesoplenty_wildflower: A type of flower that grows almost everywhere.
agricraft.plant.biomesoplenty_wilted_lil: That's what happens when you don't water your plants.
agricraft.plant.botania_black_flower.des: A beautiful flower that is as dark as the night.
agricraft.plant.botania_blue_flower.desc: A beautiful flower that is as blue as the sea.
agricraft.plant.botania_brown_flower.des: A beautiful flower that is as brown as the dirt.
agricraft.plant.botania_cyan_flower.desc: A beautiful flower of indeterminate color, being both green and blue.
agricraft.plant.botania_gray_flower.desc: A beautiful flower, albeit rather non-descript.
agricraft.plant.botania_green_flower.des: This flower seems to be envious of its other cousins with better descriptions.
agricraft.plant.botania_light_blue_flowe: A beautiful flower that is blue as the sky on a sunny day.
agricraft.plant.botania_light_gray_flowe: A beautiful flower, albeit even more non-descript than its cousin, the Mystical Gray Flower.
agricraft.plant.botania_lime_flower.desc: I wonder if this flower would taste sour?
agricraft.plant.botania_magenta_flower.d: A beautiful flower, of color which my printer is always out.
agricraft.plant.botania_orange_flower.de: A beautiful flower with a fiery disposition.
agricraft.plant.botania_pink_flower.desc: A truly beautiful flower, emanating the throes of a powerful primal force.
agricraft.plant.botania_purple_flower.de: A beautiful flower with a regal color, it certainly is of the royal lineage.
agricraft.plant.botania_red_flower.desc: A beautiful flower with a sanguine color.
agricraft.plant.buzzier_bees_buttercup.d: Do not use on your toast.
agricraft.plant.buzzier_bees_pink_clover: May the luck be with you.
agricraft.plant.environmental_cattail.de: Not really the tail of the cat.
agricraft.plant.environmental_magenta_hi: Lighter variant of the purple hibiscus.
agricraft.plant.environmental_orange_hib: The child of the red hibiscus and the yellow hibiscus.
agricraft.plant.environmental_violet.des: A beautiful ornamental flower to use in your garden.
agricraft.plant.environmental_white_lotu: Uncolored version of the red lotus flower.
agricraft.plant.horticulture_cabbage.des: A leafy, green, and round plant.
agricraft.plant.horticulture_corn.desc: One of the most popular grains. The sweet, fresh cobs are a summer favorite.
agricraft.plant.horticulture_cucumber.de: Delicious and refreshing vegetable. Commonly used thin sliced in a salad.
agricraft.plant.horticulture_eggplant.de: A rich and wholesome relative of the tomato. Delicious fried or stewed.
agricraft.plant.horticulture_green_peppe: A fruit used like a vegetable. It can be eaten raw or cooked.
agricraft.plant.horticulture_onion.desc: A bulb used to spice up your dishes.
agricraft.plant.horticulture_pineapple.d: Please don't put it on your pizza.
agricraft.plant.horticulture_spinach.des: Eat them, you'll be as strong as Popeye.
agricraft.plant.horticulture_sweet_potat: A sweeter and less bland version of the potato.
agricraft.plant.horticulture_turnip.desc: A spring tuber closely related to the radish.
agricraft.plant.supplementaries.flax.des: A plant prized for its natural cordage.
agricraft.plant.thermal_barley.desc: A cereal grain which can be ground into flour or malted to make beer or whiskey.
agricraft.plant.thermal_bell_pepper.desc: A cultivar of peppers without the spice. Commonly chopped and used in dishes.
agricraft.plant.thermal_coffee.desc: The fruit of a coffee tree, the pit of which can be roasted, ground, and brewed to make the lifeblood of mod devs.
agricraft.plant.thermal_corn.desc: A staple grain prized for its versatility.
agricraft.plant.thermal_eggplant.desc: A purple, spongy fruit used in many dishes. Tends to absorb other flavors.
agricraft.plant.thermal_frost_melon.desc: A blue cultivar of melons. Those who consume it find that even the hottest of surfaces feel icy.
agricraft.plant.thermal_green_bean.desc: The immature seed pods of a bean plant. Can be consumed alone or cooked in various dishes.
agricraft.plant.thermal_hops.desc: The seed cones of a flowering hop vine. Used to flavor beer.
agricraft.plant.thermal_onion.desc: A bulbous vegetable that is often used to add flavor to a savory dish. Brings people to tears.
agricraft.plant.thermal_peanut.desc: The seeds of a peanut plant. Often roasted, pressed into oil, or ground into peanut butter.
agricraft.plant.thermal_radish.desc: A root vegetable with a sharp flavor, typically eaten raw or steamed.
agricraft.plant.thermal_rice.desc: The most widely consumed staple grain in the world. Laborious to harvest.
agricraft.plant.thermal_sadiroot.desc: A medicinal spice known for its cleansing properties. Has a distinctive aroma.
agricraft.plant.thermal_spinach.desc: The leaves of a spinach plant. Grants sailors an increase in muscle mass.
agricraft.plant.thermal_strawberry.desc: A sweet, red fruit used in a variety of condiments and desserts.
agricraft.plant.thermal_tea.desc: The leaves of a tea plant. Often dumped into the ocean during tea parties.
agricraft.plant.thermal_tomato.desc: A savory, red fruit often sliced for dishes or squeezed for sauces and soups.
agricraft.plant.upgrade_aquatic_pink_sea: This plant has the potential to become a noxious weed.
agricraft.plant.upgrade_aquatic_polar_ke: A type of kelp that lives in really cold region.
agricraft.plant.upgrade_aquatic_purple_p: It once won the Royal Horticultural Society's Award of Garden Merit.
agricraft.plant.upgrade_aquatic_white_se: Most commonly found on the beach.
